message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper proposes a methodology for sales demand forecasting in E-commerce using a Long Short-Term Memory network (LSTM). This methodology involves training a global LSTM network that exploits the nonlinear demand relationships available in an E-commerce product assortment hierarchy. The paper also proposes a systematic pre-processing framework to overcome the challenges in an E-commerce setting and introduces several product grouping strategies to supplement the LSTM learning schemes. Based on these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
